alert.note: Alert for White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:37AM CDT until March 26 at 7:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Little Red River At Judsonia affecting White County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Red River At Judsonia. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, County roads along the Little Red River flood. Extensive flooding of the lowlands along the river. Levees protecting portions of the Bald Knob National Wildlife Refuge may be overtopped. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 32.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Little Red River Judsonia 30.0 25.2 Fri 10 AM 30.3 26.9 26.5 32.5 1 AM 3/25 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
